catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 615
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: white porcelain ewer with blue underglaze vignettes and scrolling floral patterns; vignettes of men with umbrellas in garden, and two garden scenes with birds; floral pattern on handle; narrow neck, wider body narrow spout
medium: Imari ware; porcelain with underglaze cobalt blue
title: Ewer with landscapes and flowers
